content: join with a slip_stitch to previous join and remove marker chain 1 puff in join puff in each st around to 1st marked double_crochet skip double_crochet puff in space between next two double_crochet three times skip last double_crochet puff in the top of each remaining st around join with a slip_stitch to beginning puff finish off and weave tails 20 puffs round 4 with yellow yarn join with a slip_stitch in any space between puffs chain 1 bobble in same space bobble in each space between puffs around join with a slip_stitch to beginning bobble finish off and weave tails 20 bobbles round 5 with black yarn join with a slip_stitch in bottom space between bobbles see pic chain 3 doesn t count as a st 3 treble_crochet chain 1 3 treble_crochet in space corner made * 3 double_crochet in next space between bobbles 4 times 3 treble_crochet chain 1 3 treble_crochet in next space between bobbles corner made ** repeat from * around 3 double_crochet in next space between bobbles 4 times join with a slip_stitch to beginning treble_crochet finish off and weave in tails 24 treble_crochet 48 double_crochet 3 skull granny square
